焜字的基本解释

焜
kūn
光明。

焜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kūn］
［《廣韻》胡本切，上混，匣。］
［《集韻》公渾切，平魂，見。］
(1)明亮；光耀。
(2)谓昭著。参见“焜奕”。
(3)通“昆”。同，共同。参见“焜上”。
(4)见“焜黄”。

焜字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　焜； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页673第16
【唐韻】【正韻】胡本切【集韻】【韻會】戸袞切，?音混。【說文】煌也。【玉篇】光也。【廣韻】火貌。【左傳·昭三年】焜燿寡人之望。【揚子·方言】焜，晠也。【集韻】或作煇。　又【集韻】胡昆切，音魂。義同。　又【集韻】【類篇】?公渾切，音昆。【左傳·焜燿釋文】服虔云：明也。　又與昆通。【揚雄·甘泉賦】樵烝焜上，配藜四施。【註】師古曰：焜，同也。【文選】作昆。【李善註】言燔燎之盛，故樵蒸之光同上，而披離四布也。

：明亮、光明。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kūn］
["Guangyun" Hu Benqie, upmix, box. ]
["Ji Yun" Gong Hun cut, calm soul, see. ]
(1) Bright; shining.
(2) It is obvious. See "Kun Yi".
(3) Through "Kun". Same, common. See "Kunshang".
(4) See "Kun Huang".

[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Hu Benqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Jian Gunqie,? Sound mixing. [Said Wen] Huang Ye. [Jade articles] Light also. [Guang Yun] Fire appearance. [Zuo Zhuan·Three Years of Zhao] Kun Yao's hope. [Yangtze Dialect] Kun, Ye Ye. 【Ji Yun】or Zuohui.　[Jiyun] Hu Kunqie, the soul of sound. The same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Gong Hun cut, Yin Kun. [Explanation of Zuo Zhuan·Kunyao] Fu Qianyun: Ming Ye.　And Kuntong again. 【Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu】Qiao Xuan Kun top, with four effects of quinoa.
